A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson has ruined Star Wars.  I really like the new characters created by JJ Abrams and Lawrence Kasdan\, but I feel that Rian Jonhson has weakened the new characters\, the old characters and the story. Mark Hamill was right to say he disagreed with his character\, as it was so out of character.  Critics say it was fresh\, but to me it felt like Star Wars has been put through a cheese grater and made into a bad sandwich.
